name: The King is dead Long live the King

metadata.name: "Relocation Dream"
metadata.description:
The physical painting had been burned in the project â€œThe king is dead, long live the king"
The final work includes three elements:
	1. An NFT file.
	2. A video proving the burning of the physical painting
[Relocation dream](https://youtu.be/i4xIRURSgI4)
	3. An urn  with the ashes of the painting (the urn is hermetacly closed, and will be sent only  to the first buyer by  shipping). 

Mix Technique on Canvas 140x80
Acrylic paint, spray paint, acrylic and oil based markers
More about the project in this
[video]( https://www.bellahvatskin.com/nft)
